title: give to mapcontrol of sdk 8.1 for windows phone a way to add a collection of mapicon
body: we can only add a mapicon one by one. make possible to add a range of list<mapicon> to make it faster and optimized

comments.body: I'd add to that a request to fix the deliberately broken design. As stated in the documentation "The MapIcon is not guaranteed to be shown". I'd prefer a guarantee that it is shown.
